thread.title: Emma Stone rolls her eyes at frosty BAFTAs interview with Zoe Ball
thread.title_full: Emma Stone rolls her eyes at frosty BAFTAs interview with Zoe Ball

author: Emma Powell
title: Emma Stone rolls her eyes at frosty BAFTAs interview with Zoe Ball
text:
Emma Stone rolls her eyes at frosty BAFTAs interview with Zoe Ball 
Stone looked unimpressed with Ball's line of questioning on the red carpet Monday 13 February 2017 15:13 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Awkward: Emma Stone and Zoe Ball Bafta 
Emma Stone clearly wasn’t a fan of Zoe Ball ’s line of questioning at the BAFTAs . 
The La La Land star – who won Leading Actress for her role in the Hollywood musical – kicked off this year’s ceremony with a frosty red carpet interview. 
Stone, 28, was stopped by Ball as she made her way into the Royal Albert Hall, London, and asked if she had prepared a winner’s speech. 
The actress looked bemused before rolling her eyes and replying: “Oh God. We’ll see. 
“You know, I’m just going to enjoy the show. That’s what I’m going to do.” 
Stone looked equally as unimpressed when Ball referenced the news that she is set to play Cruella de Vil in Disney's upcoming 101 Dalmatians spin-off. 
“I’ll just say the one word to you – Cruella,” Ball said. (Bafta) 
Stone replied: “What about her?” 
After Ball asked whether or not it was happening, the actress remained tight-lipped and said: “We will see, it’s very early so we’ll see how it all pans out.” British Academy Film Awards 2017 British Academy Film Awards 2017 1/42 
Duchess of Cambridge and Prince William Daniel Leal-Olivas- WPA Pool/Getty Image 2/42
